description: This Dart file defines several classes acting as state providers for a Flutter application, including navigation, events, birthdays, and messages, all utilizing ChangeNotifier for state management.

classes.name: TabIndexProvider
classes.description: Manages the current selected tab index for navigation within the app.

classes.name: EventsProvider
classes.description: Provides in-memory storage for Event objects with add capability.

classes.name: BirthdaysProvider
classes.description: Provides in-memory storage for Birthday objects with add capability.

classes.name: MessagesProvider
classes.description: Provides in-memory message storage categorized by conversation ID, with send message capability.

methods.name: setIndex
methods.description: Updates the current tab index and notifies listeners if the index changes.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new Event or Birthday to the respective in-memory list and triggers update.

methods.name: messagesFor
methods.description: Returns the list of messages for a given conversation ID.

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.description: Adds a message to a specified conversation in memory and notifies listeners.
